track.strDescriptionEN:
"Better Now" is a song by Post Malone from his second studio album, Beerbongs & Bentleys (2018). It has reached the top 10 in the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Ireland and New Zealand. It was written by Post Malone, Billy Walsh, Louis Bell and Frank Dukes, with production handled by the latter two. The song was released to US Contemporary hit radio on June 5, 2018, as the album's fifth single.

"Better Now" debuted in the top ten in various countries around the world, including at number one in Sweden, number seven in the United States, and also at number seven in the United Kingdom, becoming his third top 10 in that country. "Better Now" also became his fourth top 10 hit in Australia, peaking at number two.
